content.question: Which of the following best defines the term “judicial activism”?

choices.label: The demands on judges to hear large numbers of cases
The efforts of judges to lobby Congress for funds
The attempts by judges to influence election outcomes
The unwillingness of judges to remove themselves from cases in which they have a personal interest
The tendency of judges to interpret the Constitution according to their own views

content.answer: The tendency of judges to interpret the Constitution according to their own views

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
